org.supercsv.cellprocessor.joda

Class FmtLocalDateTime

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.supercsv.cellprocessor.CellProcessorAdaptor
      • org.supercsv.cellprocessor.joda.AbstractJodaFormattingProcessor<LocalDateTime>
        • org.supercsv.cellprocessor.joda.FmtLocalDateTime
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CellProcessor

    public class FmtLocalDateTime
extends AbstractJodaFormattingProcessor<LocalDateTime>
    Converts a Joda LocalDateTime to a String.

    For constructors using DateTimeFormatter, refer to the following Joda classes:

    • DateTimeFormat - formats by pattern and style
    • ISODateTimeFormat - ISO8601 formats
    • DateTimeFormatterBuilder - complex formats created via method calls

    For constructors using date format Strings, refer to DateTimeFormat for example formats.

    Since:
    2.3.0
    Author:
    James Bassett
